description: This file defines a Next.js page component for rendering detailed recipe pages, including dynamic metadata generation, static path generation, and various UI components for displaying recipe information such as ingredients, steps, nutrition, and images.

methods.name: generateMetadata
methods.description: Dynamically generates page metadata for SEO based on recipe content, including title, description, and Open Graph/Twitter tags.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Provides static parameters (slugs) for static site generation by importing mock recipe data.

methods.name: RecipeDetailPage
methods.description: Main React component that fetches recipe data based on URL params, handles not found case, and renders the detailed recipe page including hero, ingredients, steps, nutrition, images, and navigation.

methods.name: StepsOrdered
methods.description: Component to display an ordered list of recipe steps with instructions and optional timing.

methods.name: NutritionTable
methods.description: Component to display nutrition information in an accessible grid format.
